00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include <float.h>
00023 #include <math.h>

00025 #include <math/robust_estimators.h>
00026 #include <general/general.h>
00027 #include "affinity.h"
00028 #include "homography.h"

00030 using namespace std;

00032 
00033 homography::homography(void)
00034 {
00035   initialize();
00036 }
00037 
00038 homography::homography(float u1, float v1, float up1, float vp1,
00039                        float u2, float v2, float up2, float vp2,
00040                        float u3, float v3, float up3, float vp3,
00041                        float u4, float v4, float up4, float vp4)
00042 {
00043   initialize();
00044 
00045   estimate(u1, v1, up1, vp1,
00046           u2, v2, up2, vp2,
00047           u3, v3, up3, vp3,
00048           u4, v4, up4, vp4);
00049 }
00050 
00051 homography::~homography()
00052 {
00053         if (AA) cvReleaseMat(&AA);
00054         if (B) cvReleaseMat(&AA);
00055         if (X) cvReleaseMat(&AA);
00056         if (AA_n) cvReleaseMat(&AA_n);
00057         if (B_n) cvReleaseMat(&AA_n);
00058         if (X_n) cvReleaseMat(&AA_n);
00059         delete [] data.ptr;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void homography::initialize(void)
00063 {
00064         AA = cvCreateMat(8, 8, CV_32FC1);
00065         B  = cvCreateMat(8, 1, CV_32FC1);
00066         X  = cvCreateMat(8, 1, CV_32FC1);
00067 
00068         AA_n = NULL;
00069         B_n  = NULL;
00070         X_n  = NULL;
00071         match_number = 0;
00072         actual_match_number = 0;
00073 
00074 
00075         type = CV_32FC1;
00076 
00077         type = CV_MAT_MAGIC_VAL | CV_MAT_CONT_FLAG | CV_MAT_TYPE(type);
00078         cols = 3;
00079         rows = 3;
00080         step = cols * CV_ELEM_SIZE(type);
00081         data.ptr = (uchar*)new float[cols * rows];
00082         refcount = NULL;
00083 }
00084 
00085 ostream& operator<< (ostream& o, const homography& H)
00086 {
00087   o << cvmGet(&H, 0, 0) << "\t" << cvmGet(&H, 0, 1) << "\t" << cvmGet(&H, 0, 2) << endl;
00088   o << cvmGet(&H, 1, 0) << "\t" << cvmGet(&H, 1, 1) << "\t" << cvmGet(&H, 1, 2) << endl;
00089   o << cvmGet(&H, 2, 0) << "\t" << cvmGet(&H, 2, 1) << "\t" << cvmGet(&H, 2, 2) << endl;
00090 
00091   return o;
00092 }
00093 
00094 void homography::add_match(CvMat * pAA, CvMat * pB, int point_index, 
00095                            float u, float v, float up, float vp)
00096 {
00097   int row = point_index * 2;
00098 
00099   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 0, 0);
00100   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 1, 0);
00101   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 2, 0);
00102   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 3, -u);
00103   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 4, -v);
00104   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 5, -1);
00105   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 6, u * vp);
00106   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 7, v * vp);
00107 
00108   ::cvmSet(pB, row, 0, -vp);
00109 
00110   row++;
00111 
00112   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 0, u);
00113   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 1, v);
00114   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 2, 1);
00115   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 3, 0);
00116   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 4, 0);
00117   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 5, 0);
00118   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 6, -u * up);
00119   ::cvmSet(pAA, row, 7, -v * up);
00120 
00121   ::cvmSet(pB, row, 0, up);
00122 }
00123 
00124 bool homography::estimate(float u1, float v1, float up1, float vp1,
00125                           float u2, float v2, float up2, float vp2,
00126                           float u3, float v3, float up3, float vp3,
00127                           float u4, float v4, float up4, float vp4)
00128 {
00129   add_match(AA, B, 0, u1, v1, up1, vp1);
00130   add_match(AA, B, 1, u2, v2, up2, vp2);
00131   add_match(AA, B, 2, u3, v3, up3, vp3);
00132   add_match(AA, B, 3, u4, v4, up4, vp4);
00133 
00134   int ok = cvSolve(AA, B, X, CV_SVD);
00135 
00136   if (ok != 1)
00137   {
00138     cerr << "homography::estimate: cvSolve failure" << endl;
00139     return false;
00140   }
00141 
00142   cvmSet(0, 0, ::cvmGet(X, 0, 0));
00143   cvmSet(0, 1, ::cvmGet(X, 1, 0));
00144   cvmSet(0, 2, ::cvmGet(X, 2, 0));
00145 
00146   cvmSet(1, 0, ::cvmGet(X, 3, 0));
00147   cvmSet(1, 1, ::cvmGet(X, 4, 0));
00148   cvmSet(1, 2, ::cvmGet(X, 5, 0));
00149 
00150   cvmSet(2, 0, ::cvmGet(X, 6, 0));
00151   cvmSet(2, 1, ::cvmGet(X, 7, 0));
00152   cvmSet(2, 2, 1.);
00153 
00154   return true;
00155 }
00156 
00157 void homography::transform_point(float u, float v, float * up, float * vp)
00158 {
00159   float k = float(1. / (cvmGet(2, 0) * u + cvmGet(2, 1) * v + cvmGet(2, 2)));
00160 
00161   *up = float(k * (cvmGet(0, 0) * u + cvmGet(0, 1) * v + cvmGet(0, 2)));
00162   *vp = float(k * (cvmGet(1, 0) * u + cvmGet(1, 1) * v + cvmGet(1, 2)));
00163 }
00164 
00165 void homography::transform_point(double u, double v, double * up, double * vp)
00166 {
00167   float k = float(1. / (cvmGet(2, 0) * u + cvmGet(2, 1) * v + cvmGet(2, 2)));
00168 
00169   *up = k * (cvmGet(0, 0) * u + cvmGet(0, 1) * v + cvmGet(0, 2));
00170   *vp = k * (cvmGet(1, 0) * u + cvmGet(1, 1) * v + cvmGet(1, 2));
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 void homography::set_match_number(int n)
00175 {
00176   if (n == 0)
00177     return;
00178 
00179   match_number = n;
00180   actual_match_number = 0;
00181 
00182   if (AA_n != NULL)
00183     release_matches();
00184 
00185   AA_n = cvCreateMat(2 * match_number, 8, CV_32FC1);
00186   X_n  = cvCreateMat(8, 1, CV_32FC1);
00187   B_n  = cvCreateMat(2 * match_number, 1, CV_32FC1);
00188 }
00189 
00190 void homography::release_matches(void)
00191 {
00192   cvReleaseMat(&AA_n);
00193   cvReleaseMat(&B_n);
00194   cvReleaseMat(&X_n);
00195 }
00196 
00197 void homography::add_match(float u, float v, float up, float vp)
00198 {
00199   add_match(AA_n, B_n, actual_match_number, u, v, up, vp);
00200   actual_match_number++;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void homography::estimate(void)
00204 {
00205   if (match_number != actual_match_number)
00206   {
00207     cerr << "error when calling estimate_linear_method: not enough given matches." << endl;
00208     return;
00209   }
00210 
00211   int ok = cvSolve(AA_n, B_n, X_n, CV_SVD);
00212 
00213   if (ok != 1)
00214   {
00215     cerr << "homography::estimate: cvSolve failure" << endl;
00216     return;
00217   }
00218 
00219   cvmSet(0, 0, ::cvmGet(X_n, 0, 0));
00220   cvmSet(0, 1, ::cvmGet(X_n, 1, 0));
00221   cvmSet(0, 2, ::cvmGet(X_n, 2, 0));
00222 
00223   cvmSet(1, 0, ::cvmGet(X_n, 3, 0));
00224   cvmSet(1, 1, ::cvmGet(X_n, 4, 0));
00225   cvmSet(1, 2, ::cvmGet(X_n, 5, 0));
00226 
00227   cvmSet(2, 0, ::cvmGet(X_n, 6, 0));
00228   cvmSet(2, 1, ::cvmGet(X_n, 7, 0));
00229   cvmSet(2, 2, 1.);
00230 }
